issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
AlertDialog inherits from the wrong parent.

To change this, the properties of UI.AlertDialog need to be moved to TIProxy otherwise the properties don't work on AlertDialog and this is why it is currently this way.  This will be the case for all UI objects that should extend Proxy directly instead of View.
fields.summary: Blackberry: AlertDialog inherits from View rather than Proxy
